videos.description: Patty Mills uses the backboard to nail a jumper before the first quarter ends.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (The bank is open for Patty Mills on buzzer-beating jumper) 2021/11/14 ESHEET

videos.headline: The bank is open for Patty Mills on buzzer-beating jumper

videos.description: Kenrich Williams picks off James Harden's pass and races for the two-handed flush.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Kenrich Williams converts Harden's turnover into a slam) 2021/11/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Kenrich Williams converts Harden's turnover into a slam

videos.description: James Harden shows off his passing skills with a nice dime to LaMarcus Aldridge for a 3-pointer.

tracking.trackingName: NBA_One-Play (Harden dishes behind-the-back dime to Aldridge for 3) 2021/11/15 ESHEET

videos.headline: Harden dishes behind-the-back dime to Aldridge for 3

videos.description: James Harden absorbs contact for the tough and-1.

videos.headline: Harden takes on several OKC players for and-1

videos.description: Kevin Durant backs down Darius Bazley and powers through contact for the and-1.

videos.headline: KD hits off-balanced and-1 on Bazley

videos.description: LaMarcus Aldridge stuns OKC's defense with a spin move and slam.
